item.description:
There've been some request for another bowling night, thought Friday the 18th might fit in well.
10pm is when the "xtreme" part starts, with the low lights, music and all. So lets meet before that and get started at 10.
I'll try to get the lanes directly in front of the front door again, so when you walk in, the big group you see in front of you is us!

Price: $18.65 for three hours of bowling, includes shoes.
they have a full lounge including margaritas and are apparently known for especially good Long Island Ice Tea's.
Food: Pizza, angus steaks, basically all kinds of good stuff.

Details from their site below.
Hope to see you there!
-Neil


Welcome To

Join A New Bowling League Today. It's Easy. Use our new online sign up form.

We also offer a great new food & beverage menu that's sure to amaze you. And we'll serve it to you laneside so you can keep the fun flowing. Bowling has changed. Come in and enjoy the new experience at AMF.

Upcoming Events
Xtreme Bowling

Looking for late night or weekend bowling fun? Take your game to an unexplored new level with Xtreme Bowling ? an adventure of lights, great music, wild bowling challenges, and (of course) your favorite food & beverages.
item.name: Bowlin' 2: Electric Boogaloo
